title: Client too big whenever I open it?
body: Whenever I open my client after logging off my computer beforehand, the client login screen gets super big and I have to change my screen resolution every single time in order to get it back to normal size. Any idea how I can fix this? Haven't had this problem for a while but now it seems to be popping up again. Thanks!

replies.body: so i tried the suggestion from broporo....but i can't get it to work now i can resolve it by using task view making a new desktop everytime i open the game and placing the game in it going to the other original desktop and changing resolution...and that worked a few days ago until they did w/e the hell they've done now.....NOW I DON'T EVEN GET THE ENTIRE BOTTOM OF MY CLIENT TO LOAD AND I CAN'T CHANGE MY RUNES AND MASTERIES...THIS IS LIKE BURGER KING MAKING A NEW SANDWICH AND DISCONTINUING ALL THE OTHER ONES....PURE GENIUS RIOT...PURE GENIUS....

This might have something to do with a wonky config file. Let's try resetting those to see if that helps.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if that doesn't help!
